document_data.mainbody: '''Duskview House''' was an inn outside [[Triel]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Dusvkiew house was located atop a knoll, overlooking [[Dusk Road]].
document_data.Interior: The place was newly built as of {{yearlink|1357}}, and had a lounge that was downright palatial. The lounge's ceiling was whitedaub, with a [[dragon motif]], and had holes, most likely for peeping.
document_data.Services: According to [[Arauntar]], the house was highcoin, that is, expensive, and was likely to sell foodstuffs. The stewards there served alcohol, amongst other amenities. Orthil thought people were almost certainly staying there, strongly implying the place was an inn.
document_data.History:
The place was newly built as of {{yearlink|1357}}.

Late that year, [[Orthil Voldovan]]'s caravan stopped there, looking for reinforcements after suffering a series of ambushes on its way from [[Scornubel]] to [[Waterdeep]].{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|357|20}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It was said that the inn was raised by [[Thayan]] mages.
